caption: r&b, soul, funk/soul
lyrics:
[verse]
Dancing through electric fires
Heart is buzzing like live wires
In your arms I find desire
Feel the beat as we get higher

[chorus]
Electric love in the night sky
We’re gonna soar baby you and I
Drop the bass let the rhythm fly
Feel the heat and don't ask why

[verse]
Whisper secrets that make me blush
Under the neon city hush
Your touch gives me such a rush
Turn it up we're feeling lush

[chorus]
Electric love in the night sky
We’re gonna soar baby you and I
Drop the bass let the rhythm fly
Feel the heat and don't ask why

[bridge]
Through the lights and the smoky haze
I see you in a thousand ways
Love's a script and we’re the play
Turn the page stay till we sway

[chorus]
Electric love in the night sky
We’re gonna soar baby you and I
Drop the bass let the rhythm fly
Feel the heat and don't ask why
